Brenda Burgo Leather Display Case with LED (1 Rose) Adam Myrick Great Priceless Presious Product Really Love The Quality and Look Of This Priceless Presious Product; A Genuine Gem On Display Kevin Y 24K Gold Forever Rose - Amethyst (February Birthstone) Top marks for customer service and satisfaction This company is in Business with customer service and satisfaction as a top priority Dawn S Silver Dipped Roses: One Dozen Brendan McGinnity 1118 FEATURED COLLECTIONS Wine Collection THE ORIGINAL FOREVER ROSE The Rose has long been a symbol of love, beauty, and emotion. It has been immortalized for centuries in the art and literature of many cultures. It is, to the world, what Gold, Silver, and Platinum are to the realm of precious metals. These timeless symbols of richness and beauty have been perfectly combined to create our elegant Forever Rose STARTS WITH REAL ROSES The journey starts in our nursery, where our highly skilled horticulturalists and staff spare no expense. They carefully monitor each rose as it grows and begins to bloom. As it reaches its ideal moment of perfection and beauty, it is chosen and harvested. THE PROCESS Once we harvest the rose, the journey has only begun. With over 60 meticulous steps and ten days of hand work by skilled artisans and technicians, each Forever Rose is one-of-a-kind, unique and everlasting. We use a proprietary process known as electroforming to plate multiple layers onto the rose. This is done in many very light layers to maintain as much natural detail of the rose as possible. These steps are performed under strict quality control to assure the highest level of quality. THE RESULT With over twenty years of experience, our world-famous Forever Roses are second to none. All Forever Roses come with a 90-day money back guarantee and an exclusive Lifetime Warranty. When you purchase a Forever Rose you can be confident that it will exceed your expectations and be a cherished keepsake for years to come. Learn More WHY BUY FROM US Lifetime Guarantee on All Roses. As part of the Forever RosePromise, we now guarantee ourlegendary roses for life! This warranty covers flaws that develop in our products as a result of manufacturing defects. Free Ground Shipping in the Continental United States. Get free ground shipping to thelower 48 states. Need it sooner?Expedited shipping options arealso available during checkout. Free ground shipping applies to orders over $50.00 in the continental U.S 90-Day Hassle Free Return Policy. Our 90-day hassle-free returnÂ policy means you can return a product for replacement or full refund (less shipping) within 90 days from invoice date. thought: The SSL certificate information retrieved shows that the website has a valid certificate issued by Let's Encrypt, which is a well-known certificate authority. The certificate has not expired and covers the domain in question. This adds to the legitimacy of the site. Based on all the information gathered from the WHOIS data, the content of the site, and the valid SSL certificate, there are no indications that the site is a scam. The prices, while not cheap, are reasonable for the type of luxury product being sold. The website has been registered for a significant amount of time, and there are no overt signs of a scam based on the criteria provided. It appears to be a legitimate e-commerce site selling a specialized product. I now know the final answer. The website https://theforeverrose.com/ does not appear to be a scam.

observation.reason: The website has been established for a long time based on WHOIS data, the prices are reasonable for the type of product being sold, and there are no obvious scam characteristics such as targeting weaknesses or offering high returns.
